item.title: Report E-2024010507
item.description:
Report E-2024010507

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-02T15:12:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-26
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal USU experienced a UN1263 Duracron S600 Gray Texture release from a 55-gallon metal drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 22-gallons of product released to a 25’ x 4’ area of the trailer floor due to a forklift puncture. The damaged drum was placed into an 85-gallon metal overpack. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted area. All impacted absorbents were containerized into a 55-gallon metal drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
